edu.umd.cs.psl.util.datasplitter.builddbstep

Class QueryAtomsBuildDBStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.util.datasplitter.builddbstep.QueryAtomsBuildDBStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BuildDBStep

    public class QueryAtomsBuildDBStep
extends java.lang.Object
implements BuildDBStep
    This class uses a Map of QueryAtom objects and corresponding Variable substitution map (similar to DatabasePopulator) to generate the atoms corresponding to inference targets. Instead of using the GroundTerm arguments to the QueryAtom, ground terms associated with each GroundAtom are generated from the supplied Partition collections.

      • QueryAtomsBuildDBStep

        public QueryAtomsBuildDBStep(java.util.Set<StandardPredicate> toClose,
                     java.util.Map<QueryAtom,java.util.Map<Variable,java.util.Set<GroundTerm>>> queryAtoms)
        Parameters:
        toClose - the set of predicates that will be closed for the experimental task
        queryAtoms - a map, where each entry is a QueryAtom and substitution map, corresponding to Variables in the QueryAtom. Non-variable terms will be ignored.
